articles.title: Truth or tale: is Switzerland injecting harmful chemicals into the sky?
articles.author: Swissinfo
articles.summary: After we published a story on solar geoengineering, we received a number of social media comments referencing the 'chemtrails' conspiracy theory. Some users claimed that the white trails left by aircraft are actually harmful chemicals being deliberately released into the environment.

articles.title: Wildfire grows on Vancouver Island as crews battle difficult terrain
articles.author: North Shore News
articles.summary: A wildfire on Vancouver Island has grown to 2.45 square kilometres. The difficult-to-access terrain is presenting a challenge for crews fighting the fire. The fire is burning on the north banks of Cameron Lake, about 60 km away from the nearest city.

articles.title: Massive Ocean Regime Shift, Alarming
articles.author: Dissident Voice
articles.summary: A new study claims severe ocean overheating may be causing a fundamental climate shift. Ocean heatwaves over the past couple of years have been massive and extensive and intensive on a scale never seen, according to the study. The study is titled "The Oceans are Overheating – and Scientists Say a Climate Tipping Point May be Here".
